TRAILERS

by
July 20, 2025
Source: YouTube

"We have to get out of here..." Good luck. Saban Films has revealed an official US trailer for an indie horror titled River of Blood, make by UK genre filmmaker Howard J. Ford. This crazy brutal cannibal horror is being dumped on VOD in the summer - starting in August next month. Four kayakers take the wrong river into hell. Will they escape? A jungle kayak adventure descends into terror when a group of friends becomes the target of a merciless, bloodthirsty tribe of cannibals. This stars Joseph Millson, Louis James, Ella Starbuck, Sarah Alexandra Marks, and David Wayman. More horror filmmakers keep trying to make cannibal horror movies, but none of them will ever live up to the intensity of Apocalypto or brutality of The Green Inferno. This looks like another generic cannibal tribe thriller without much of anything new to offer.

Here's the official trailer (+ posters) for Howard J. Ford's horror River of Blood, direct from YouTube:

A group of four kayakers on an adventure accidentally take the wrong river, leading them into a jungle where they encounter a tribe of ruthless cannibals. River of Blood is directed by British B-movie writer / filmmaker Howard J. Ford, director of the films Mainline Run, Distant Shadow, The Dead 1 & 2, Never Let Go, Adventure Boyz, The Lockdown Hauntings, The Ledge, Escape, and also DarkGame previously. The screenplay is written by Tom Boyle. Produced by Howard J. Ford, Tom Boyle, & Rikke Ennis. This initially premiered last year and already opened in some European countries late 2024. Saban Films debuts Ford's River of Blood horror film direct-to-VOD in the US starting August 1st, 2025 coming soon. Anyone down?
